title: Timeline
text:
05 April 2023, SARA Institute Inauguration
SARA Institute was inaugurated and started its first class.









First data science class







First R data science course









Family & Friends at Inaugration

title: Timeline
text:
14 April 2023, SARA Institute
We celebrated Babasaheb Dr.¬†Bhim Rao Ambedkar‚Äôs Birth Anniversary at the SARA.

title: Timeline
text:
04 June 2023, Bichala & Salarpur Villages, RJ
We visited 2-3 villages to promote data science education among the SC/ST/OBC students.
Attended the Kabir Jayanti celebration.
Also, meet a Bahujan student who secured 93% marks in the 10th class.

title: Timeline
text:
11 June 2023, Tijara, RJ
SC-ST Youth Awareness Event conducted at Tijara, RJ.

title: Timeline
text:
26 July 2023, Tijara, RJ
We were invited as the chief guests at this event. Purpose of this event was to facilitate the Bahujan students who secured distinction in secondary and higher secondary exams in Rajasthan. We interacted with the students and shared information about the SARA Institute.

title: Timeline
text:
27 September 2023, Sonipat, HR


Jai Bhim üíôTo achieve our dreams, today @kiran_kolii & I are moving to a new place üòÅ pic.twitter.com/Fzhj4mkmhC

‚Äî Ajay Koli, PhD (@ajay_kolii) September 27, 2023

title: Timeline
text:
01 October 2023, Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan, Sonipat
Dear President and committee members of the Ambedkar Educational Society Sonipat, we wanted to extend our heartfelt gratitude for your generosity in providing us with free space in the Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan to educate underrepresented students in India. Your support is not just appreciated; it is truly a beacon of hope and opportunity.
Your belief in our mission to empower those who have historically been underprivileged is invaluable. It is thanks to partners like you that we can create a more inclusive and equitable educational landscape in our country.













The free space you have provided is not just a physical location; it is a place where dreams are nurtured, where aspirations take flight, and where the future of countless students is being transformed for the better.
Your contribution goes far beyond bricks and mortar; it is an investment in the potential and promise of these students, and it will undoubtedly lead to a brighter, more promising future for them and our nation as a whole.
Once again, thank you for your unwavering support and for being a crucial part of our journey to make education accessible to all. Together, we are making a profound difference in the lives of countless underrepresented students.
With deep gratitude,
Ajay Koli & Kiran Koli

title: STATISTICS USING R  SARA Data Science Winter School 2024
text:
Download above Flyer







Welcome to the SARA Data Science Winter School!
The SARA Data Science Winter School ‚ÄúStatistics using R‚Äù will take place on December 16 - 20, 2024.
The classes will be offered physically in-person at the SARA Institute, Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan, Sonipat, Haryana - 131001.

REGISTRATION FOR THE 2024 SARA DATA SCIENCE WINTER SCHOOL IS NOW OPEN!


THERE IS NO TUITION FEE.
FOR FOOD AND ACCOMMODATION PAY Rs. 6000.
15 December: Arrival of the participants.
16 to 20 December: Classes for the participants.
21 December: Departure of the participants.



Payment Link
Registration Link






5 Days Courses (10 AM to 1 PM & 2 PM to 5 PM; 30 Hours)
December 16 ‚Äì 20, 2024

üóì Day 1: INTRODUCTION TO STATISTICS
Morning Session (10:00 AM ‚Äì 1:00 PM)
Topic: Importance of Statistics in Social Sciences

Overview of key concepts: population, sample, variable, data types (nominal, ordinal, interval, ratio)
Descriptive vs.¬†inferential statistics

Activity: Exploring Basic Data Types in R

Load a dataset and explore different data types using str(), summary(), and glimpse() functions.

 Lunch Break (1-2 PM)
Afternoon Session (2:00 PM ‚Äì 5:00 PM)
Topic: Data Collection Methods and Sampling Techniques

Methods of data collection: surveys, observational studies, experiments
Types of sampling: random, stratified, systematic

Activity: Sampling Techniques in R

Generate random and stratified samples using R‚Äôs sample() and dplyr package.


üóì Day 2: Descriptive Statistics
üóì Day 3: Data Visualization & Probability
üóì Day 4: Hypothesis Testing & Correlation
üóì Day 5: Regression Analysis
Further details regarding the course modules will be provided shortly. Stay tuned for updates on the curriculum, including specific topics, and key skills covered in each module.










We‚Äôre thrilled to host you at Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan, on Kakroi Road, Sonipat, Haryana - 131001. Please find the venue‚Äôs Google Map link for your convenience: Venue Location.
At Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan, our priority is to ensure your comfort and well-being during your stay. While we may not offer hotel-like amenities, we are committed to providing you with a cozy and welcoming atmosphere.


Enjoy vegetarian meals served for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.




For Female Participants: You‚Äôll be accommodated in a dedicated ‚Äúfemale only‚Äù common hall furnished with beds, mattresses, and shared desert coolers. Rest assured, you‚Äôll have access to a ‚Äúfemale only‚Äù shared bathroom for your convenience and privacy.
For Male Participants: Two male participants will be comfortably lodged in a ‚Äúmale only‚Äù sharing room within the premises. Additionally, they will have access to a ‚Äúmale only‚Äù shared bathroom for their comfort and convenience.

We are committed to making your stay enjoyable and memorable. Should you have any special requirements or concerns, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to our team. We look forward to hosting you and creating wonderful memories together at Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan.




Here are some travel guidelines to reach Sonipat, Haryana:
By Air: The nearest airport to Sonipat is Indira Gandhi International Airport (DEL) in New Delhi, which is approximately 75 kilometers away. From the airport, you can hire a taxi or take a bus to reach Sonipat.
By Train: Sonipat is well-connected by rail to major cities across India. The Sonipat Railway Station is situated on the Northern Railway network and serves as an important junction. You can check for trains to Sonipat from your departure point and book tickets accordingly.
By Road: Sonipat is easily accessible by road, with well-maintained highways connecting it to nearby cities like Delhi, Chandigarh, and Jaipur. You can either drive to Sonipat or opt for bus services operated by state transport or private operators.

If you‚Äôre coming from Delhi, you can take NH44 or NH9 to reach Sonipat, which is approximately a 1.5 to 2-hour drive depending on traffic conditions.
From Chandigarh, you can take NH44 via Ambala and continue towards Sonipat.
If you‚Äôre traveling from Jaipur, you can take NH48 and NH352A to reach Sonipat.

Local Transportation: Once you reach Sonipat, you can easily get around the city using auto-rickshaws, cycle rickshaws, or taxis. Public buses also ply on various routes within the city and to nearby areas.
Safe travels, and we look forward to welcoming you to Sonipat, Haryana!






There is no tuition fee for any participant. The fee of Rs. 6000 includes only the food and accommodation for five days (December 16 - 20) at the SARA Institute, Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan, Sonipat, Haryana - 131001.




Registered participants requesting to withdraw from the SARA Winter School within two weeks of payment receive a full refund of the food and accommodation fees less an administrative charge of 500 INR.
Withdrawals received more than two weeks after payment has been made and before Sunday, November 10, 2024, receive a 50% refund. No refunds will be given for withdrawals after Sunday, November 10, 2024.
Registered participants on winter school canceled by the SARA Institute will be offered a full refund of their food and accommodation fees.
The SARA Institute is not liable for travel and other expenses incurred in connection with the SARA Winter School.

For further details about the winter school, courses, instructors, financial assistance, food, and accommodation please contact:
 sara.institute.info@gmail.com.
 Mobile number: 925 315 2024
All participants receive an ungraded certificate of attendance on the last day of the SARA Winter School.
Participants should bring their own laptop.
Embark on an exciting journey of learning and exploration with us!
Know about our previous data science training.

title: Computer Skills
text:
The SARA Computer Skills Course is designed to empower students and community members with essential computer knowledge, helping them thrive in today‚Äôs digital world. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or looking to enhance your current skills, this course offers a comprehensive introduction to key computer concepts and tools.



Basic Computer Operations: Learn how to navigate computer systems, manage files, and use essential functions like word processing and spreadsheets.
Introduction to the Internet: Gain confidence in using the internet for research, communication, and accessing online resources.
Microsoft Office Tools: Get hands-on experience with widely used programs such as Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
Email and Online Communication: Understand how to create and manage emails, participate in online meetings, and use communication tools like Zoom.
Cybersecurity Basics: Learn how to stay safe online, protect personal information, and avoid common security threats.




The course is open to everyone, including students, working professionals, and community members who want to improve their computer literacy. No prior experience is needed.




Improve your job prospects with key technical skills
Gain confidence in using computers and online tools
Access more opportunities for education and professional growth





Duration: 3 months (offered 3-4 times in a year)
Mode: Only in-person sessions available


Join us at the SARA Institute of Data Science and take your first step towards digital empowerment!

 Call us: 925 315 2024

title: Terms and Conditions
text:
Welcome to the SARA Institute of Data Science. By enrolling in our courses or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please review the terms carefully before proceeding with any course registration or participation in our programs.




These Terms and Conditions apply to all participants of courses offered by the SARA Institute of Data Science.
By registering for any course, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these terms.
We reserve the right to update these terms at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our services signifies your acceptance of any such changes.






Enrollment in our courses is open to individuals of all ages and educational backgrounds.
Participants are required to provide accurate personal information during the registration process. Any false or incomplete information may lead to cancellation of enrollment.
Enrollment is confirmed only after the full payment of course fees, where applicable.






Course fees must be paid in full before the commencement of the course. We accept payments through various online and offline modes, as specified during the registration process.
Fees may vary based on the course and specific packages offered. Participants will be informed of all fees before registration.






Course Cancellation by SARA: If the course is canceled or rescheduled by the SARA Institute of Data Science, participants will be entitled to a full refund of the course fee or an option to enroll in a future session.
Cancellation by Participant: If a participant wishes to cancel their enrollment, the following refund policy applies:

Cancellation 14 days or more before the course start date: Full refund of the course fee.
Cancellation 7-13 days before the course start date: 50% refund of the course fee.
Cancellation less than 7 days before the course start date: No refund will be issued.

Non-Refundable Fees: Any registration or processing fees are non-refundable, regardless of the cancellation time frame.






The SARA Institute of Data Science reserves the right to make changes to the course content, schedule, or instructor if necessary. Participants will be notified of any significant changes in advance.
In the event of significant course modifications, participants may request to transfer to a different course or receive a pro-rated refund based on the portion of the course attended.






Participants are expected to behave in a respectful and professional manner throughout the course. This includes interaction with instructors, staff, and fellow participants.
Any disruptive, offensive, or inappropriate behavior may result in removal from the course without a refund.
Participants are prohibited from sharing or distributing course materials without prior permission from the SARA Institute of Data Science.






All course materials, including videos, documents, presentations, and exercises, are the intellectual property of the SARA Institute of Data Science. They are provided for personal use only and may not be reproduced, distributed, or shared in any form without prior written consent.






The SARA Institute of Data Science is not liable for any personal injury, loss, or damage to property that occurs during participation in its courses or events.
While we strive to offer high-quality educational experiences, the SARA Institute makes no guarantees regarding personal outcomes or career advancement resulting from course completion.






We are committed to protecting your privacy. Any personal information collected during course registration or participation will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
Your data will not be shared with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.






These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Haryana.





If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions or our refund policies, please contact us at:
SARA Institute of Data Science
Email: sara.institute.info@gmail.com
Phone: 925 315 2024

By enrolling in our courses, you agree to abide by the above Terms and Conditions. Thank you for choosing the SARA Institute of Data Science, and we look forward to helping you achieve your learning goals!




This page was last updated on 2024-11-22 18:05:59.97326

title: News & Events
text:
We at SARA Institute would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to The News Beak for featuring us in their news coverage. This recognition is a testament to the hard work, dedication, and passion of everyone involved at SARA, from our students and volunteers to our supporters and educators. Being highlighted by a respected outlet like The News Beak not only amplifies our mission of empowering marginalized communities in India through data science education but also validates our ongoing efforts to create equitable opportunities.
This feature will undoubtedly help spread awareness about our initiatives, fostering more support and engagement from the community. We are committed to continuing our work with the same enthusiasm and to reaching even more students who can benefit from quality education and mentorship.
Thank you once again, The News Beak, for shining a light on our journey. Your support plays a vital role in motivating us to keep moving forward and expanding our impact.

title: English Language
text:
The SARA English Language Course is designed to help students and community members enhance their English communication skills for both personal and professional development. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or looking to improve your fluency, this course covers essential aspects of the English language to boost your confidence in speaking, writing, and understanding English.



Basic Grammar and Vocabulary: Learn the fundamentals of English grammar, sentence structure, and expand your vocabulary to improve both written and spoken communication.
Speaking and Listening Skills: Practice conversational English through interactive sessions, role-playing, and listening exercises to enhance your speaking confidence and comprehension.
Reading and Writing: Develop skills to read with better understanding and write clearly and effectively, covering both informal and formal styles.
Pronunciation and Accent Training: Improve your pronunciation and work on reducing any accent barriers, allowing you to communicate more effectively in diverse settings.
English for Daily Use: Learn practical language skills that can be used in everyday situations, such as job interviews, travel, and casual conversations.




This course is open to anyone who wants to improve their English language skills, including students, professionals, and community members. No prior knowledge is required, and all levels are welcome.




Improve communication skills for education and career opportunities
Gain confidence in speaking English in social and professional settings
Enhance your ability to read and write in English
Increase your chances of success in job interviews and workplace interactions





Duration: 6 months (offered twice in a year)
Mode: Only in-person sessions available


Join the SARA Institute of Data Science and unlock new opportunities by improving your English language proficiency today!

 Call us: 925 315 2024

The SARA English Language Course is designed to help students and community members enhance their English communication skills for both personal and professional development. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or looking to improve your fluency, this course covers essential aspects of the English language to boost your confidence in speaking, writing, and understanding English.



Basic Grammar and Vocabulary: Learn the fundamentals of English grammar, sentence structure, and expand your vocabulary to improve both written and spoken communication.
Speaking and Listening Skills: Practice conversational English through interactive sessions, role-playing, and listening exercises to enhance your speaking confidence and comprehension.
Reading and Writing: Develop skills to read with better understanding and write clearly and effectively, covering both informal and formal styles.
Pronunciation and Accent Training: Improve your pronunciation and work on reducing any accent barriers, allowing you to communicate more effectively in diverse settings.
English for Daily Use: Learn practical language skills that can be used in everyday situations, such as job interviews, travel, and casual conversations.




This course is open to anyone who wants to improve their English language skills, including students, professionals, and community members. No prior knowledge is required, and all levels are welcome.




Improve communication skills for education and career opportunities
Gain confidence in speaking English in social and professional settings
Enhance your ability to read and write in English
Increase your chances of success in job interviews and workplace interactions





Duration: 6 months (offered twice in a year)
Mode: Only in-person sessions available


Join the SARA Institute of Data Science and unlock new opportunities by improving your English language proficiency today!

 Call us: 925 315 2024

title: Reproducible Research Using R
text: We extend our heartfelt thanks to all the participants, speakers, and supporters for their invaluable contributions in making the SARA Data Science Bootcamp a resounding success.

title: Reproducible Research Using R
text:
Courses
Unlock Your Potential in Research, Statistics, and Data Science
Immerse yourself in the world of research with data science through the SARA Summer School. Our intensive training program is designed to equip participants with the essential skills and knowledge needed to excel in conducting research using data science tool R.
Each day will start with a guest lecturer (around 45-55 minutes) from a distinguished international faculty. Later, Ajay Kumar Koli will teach most of the courses.
Participants will be doing the following courses:

5 Days Courses (9 am to 12:30 pm & 1:30 pm to 6 pm; 40 hours):
22-26 July 2024

üóìÔ∏è Day 1 (22 July): Introduction to Data Science

Online Expert LectureIn-person sessions



 Keynote Lecture
 Dr.¬†Tankiso Moloi Professor and Academic Director University of Johannesburg, ZA. | 
 22 JULY 11:30 AM IST.



 Data Science for Under-Represented Communities in India.
 Jay Bharat Choudhari, MSc in Data, Inequality and Society, University of Edinburgh, UK | 
 22 JULY 5 PM IST.




Faculty: Dr.¬†Ajay Kumar Koli

R & RStudio.
Types of operators.

RStudio project.

Coding using console, script & quarto.
Structure of R function.

R packages.

Create objects.
Communicate using quarto.
Help from R community.





üóì Day 2 (23 July): Data Visualization

Online Expert LectureIn-person sessions



 A Visual Introduction to Data Visualization.
 Dr.¬†Samantha MacBride, Adj Asst Professor, Baruch College, USA | 
 23 JULY 5 PM IST.




Faculty: Dr.¬†Ajay Kumar Koli

Introduction & first steps.
ggplot2 calls.
Visualizing distributions.
Visualizing relationships.

Saving your plots.

Common problems.





üóì Day 3 (24 July): Research Design in Social Sciences

Online Expert LectureIn-person sessions



 Preparing for Higher Education Abroad.
 Damni Kain, PhD Candidate, University of Cambridge, UK and DBA Lead at Project EduAccess. 
 24 JULY 9 AM IST.




 Research Methods: An Introduction for Everyone.
 Dr.¬†Samantha MacBride, Adj Asst Professor, Baruch College, USA. 
 24 JULY 5 PM IST.




Faculty: Dr.¬†Ajay Kumar Koli

Research framework.

Research approaches.

Ethics in research.

Literature review and its tools.

Levels of measurement.

Sampling and its types.

Quantitative methods and analysis.

Qualitative methods and analysis.





üóì Day 4 (25 July): Quantitative Data Analysis

Online Expert LectureIn-person sessions



 Numbers, they are Part of our Everyday Life.
 Adanvo Isaac Houngnigbe, Biostatistician, Center of Excellence in Epidemiology and Data Science, Benin. 
 25 JULY 9 AM IST.




 Validity, Rigor, and Proof in the Social Sciences.
 Dr.¬†Deepak Malghan, Assistant Professor, IIM Bangalore, IN. 
 25 JULY 5 PM IST.




Faculty: Dr.¬†Ajay Kumar Koli

Data and table manners.

Average and percentiles.

Spreads.

Transforming data.

The normal distribution.

From samples to populations.

Getting confident.
Fun with proportions.

Correlation and regression.





üóì Day 5 (26 July): Publish using R and GitHub

Online Expert LectureIn-person sessions



 Improving First-Generation College Students‚Äô Education and Employment Outcomes..
 Gopinath Annadurai, PhD Candidate, IIM Bangalore, IN. 
 26 JULY 9 AM IST.




 Scholarship with Soul: Crafting a Meaningful Academic Identity..
 Dr.¬†Babu George, Professor of Management, Alcorn State University, USA. .
 26 JULY 5 PM IST.




Faculty: Dr.¬†Ajay Kumar Koli

Reproducible research.

Dynamic thesis, articles and slides.
Add links and images.

Prepare list.

Write equations.

Prepare tables.

Reference management.

Learn using GitHub.

Make your own website.

title: Reproducible Research Using R
text:
Food & Accommodation, supported By





We‚Äôre thrilled to host you at Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan, on Kakroi Road, Sonipat, Haryana - 131001. Please find the venue‚Äôs Google Map link for your convenience: Venue Location.
At Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan, our priority is to ensure your comfort and well-being during your stay. While we may not offer hotel-like amenities, we are committed to providing you with a cozy and welcoming atmosphere.
As part of our commitment to sustainability and minimizing plastic waste, we kindly ask all participants to bring their own reusable eating utensils and bed sheet.

Food
Enjoy vegetarian meals served for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.


Accommodation

For Female Participants: You‚Äôll be accommodated in a dedicated ‚Äúfemale only‚Äù common hall furnished with beds, mattresses, and shared desert coolers. Rest assured, you‚Äôll have access to a ‚Äúfemale only‚Äù shared bathroom for your convenience and privacy.
For Male Participants: Two male participants will be comfortably lodged in a ‚Äúmale only‚Äù sharing room within the premises. Additionally, they will have access to a ‚Äúmale only‚Äù shared bathroom for their comfort and convenience.

We are committed to making your stay enjoyable and memorable. Should you have any special requirements or concerns, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to our team. We look forward to hosting you and creating wonderful memories together at Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan.

title: Reproducible Research Using R
text:
Travel Guidelines
Here are some travel guidelines to reach Sonipat, Haryana:
By Air: The nearest airport to Sonipat is Indira Gandhi International Airport (DEL) in New Delhi, which is approximately 75 kilometers away. From the airport, you can hire a taxi or take a bus to reach Sonipat.
By Train: Sonipat is well-connected by rail to major cities across India. The Sonipat Railway Station is situated on the Northern Railway network and serves as an important junction. You can check for trains to Sonipat from your departure point and book tickets accordingly.
By Road: Sonipat is easily accessible by road, with well-maintained highways connecting it to nearby cities like Delhi, Chandigarh, and Jaipur. You can either drive to Sonipat or opt for bus services operated by state transport or private operators.

If you‚Äôre coming from Delhi, you can take NH44 or NH9 to reach Sonipat, which is approximately a 1.5 to 2-hour drive depending on traffic conditions.
From Chandigarh, you can take NH44 via Ambala and continue towards Sonipat.
If you‚Äôre traveling from Jaipur, you can take NH48 and NH352A to reach Sonipat.

Local Transportation: Once you reach Sonipat, you can easily get around the city using auto-rickshaws, cycle rickshaws, or taxis. Public buses also ply on various routes within the city and to nearby areas.
Safe travels, and we look forward to welcoming you to Sonipat, Haryana!

title: Reproducible Research Using R
text:
Fee
There is no tuition fee for any participant. The fee of Rs. 6000 /- includes only the food and accommodation for ten days (20-28 July) at the SARA Institute, Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan, Sonipat, Haryana - 131001.

title: Reproducible Research Using R
text:
Cancellation Policy

Registered participants requesting to withdraw from the SARA Summer School within two weeks of payment receive a full refund of the food and accommodation fees less an administrative charge of 500 INR.
Withdrawals received more than two weeks after payment has been made and before Thursday, June 20, 2024, receive a 50% refund. No refunds will be given for withdrawals after Thursday, June 20, 2024.
Registered participants on summer school canceled by the SARA Institute will be offered a full refund of their food and accommodation fees.
The SARA Institute is not liable for travel and other expenses incurred in connection with the SARA Summer School.

For further details about the summer school, courses, instructors, financial assistance, food, and accommodation please contact:
 sara.institute.info@gmail.com.
 Mobile number: 925 315 2024
All participants receive an ungraded certificate of attendance on the last day of the SARA Summer School.
Participants should bring their own laptop.
Join us on a journey of learning and discovery!

title: Mission
text:
SARA Institute is dedicated to empowering underrepresented communities in India through data science education. Our mission is to cultivate a vibrant data science community where individuals from all backgrounds can thrive, learn, and contribute to society.




 




Welcome to SARA!

At SARA Institute, we believe in the transformative power of education. Our mission is to provide data science education to underserved communities, empowering individuals to reach their full potential and create positive change in their lives and communities.
Founded on the principles of equity and access, SARA is committed to breaking down barriers to education and ensuring that everyone, regardless of their background or circumstances, has the opportunity to learn and thrive.
At SARA Institute, we believe that education is a fundamental human right and a catalyst for social change. Join us in our mission to build a brighter, more equitable future through education. Together, we can make a difference in the lives of individuals and communities around the world.







 



The Sara Education Trust (Registered) was established by Dr.¬†Ajay Koli and Dr.¬†Kiran Koli, visionaries committed to transforming education. Their dedication to providing accessible learning opportunities led to the inception of the Savitribai Ramabai Institute of Data Science (SARA Institute) on April 5, 2023.
At SARA, we believe in the power of education without barriers. That‚Äôs why we offer tuition-free courses in data science, computer skills, English language proficiency, and research methodologies to all students.
Before embarking on their mission with SARA, Dr.¬†Ajay and Dr.¬†Kiran served as full-time Assistant Professors at various private universities. Today, their sole focus is on nurturing SARA Institute‚Äôs educational initiatives.
Based in Sonipat, they reside in a rented house, juggling their roles as educators and recently embracing parenthood with the arrival of their ‚ù§Ô∏è beautiful daughter.
Their journey is indebted to the support and collaboration of the Ambedkar Educational Society, Sonipat, for graciously permitting SARA Institute to conduct classes at the esteemed Ambedkar Bhawan, Sonipat.
With a steadfast commitment to excellence and inclusivity, Dr.¬†Ajay and Dr.¬†Kiran continue to inspire and empower students on their educational journey at SARA Institute.

title: Privacy Policy
text:
At the SARA Institute of Data Science, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you interact with our website, services, and courses.



We collect personal information to provide you with the best educational experience. The types of information we collect include:

Personal Identification Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.
Payment Information: When you enroll in a course, we collect payment details necessary to process your payment, such as credit card information or bank account details.
Course Participation Data: Information about your participation in courses, including attendance, progress, and feedback.
Technical Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and usage patterns when you visit our website.





We use your information for the following purposes:

To Provide Educational Services: This includes processing your registration, delivering course content, tracking your progress, and issuing certificates upon completion.
Communication: We may use your contact information to send updates about courses, upcoming events, important notices, and promotional offers.
Improvement of Services: We analyze data to improve the quality and effectiveness of our courses and to enhance user experience on our website.
Payment Processing: To securely process payments and issue refunds (where applicable).
Legal and Compliance: To comply with legal requirements and enforce our policies.





We respect your privacy and do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties. However, we may share your information in the following circumstances:

Service Providers: We may share information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, processing payments, or delivering course content. These service providers are required to keep your information confidential and use it only for the purposes we specify.
Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required by law, court order, or government regulations.
Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your information may be transferred to the new entity.





We take the security of your personal information seriously and implement the following measures:

Data Encryption: Sensitive information such as payment details is encrypted using secure socket layer (SSL) technology.
Access Controls: We restrict access to personal data to authorized personnel only, ensuring that your information is only accessible to those who need it to provide services to you.
Regular Security Audits: We regularly review and update our security practices to protect against unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure of personal data.





You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

Access: You can request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
Correction: You can request that we correct any inaccuracies in your information.
Deletion: You can request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain legal obligations.
Opt-out of Marketing: You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications by following the unsubscribe link in our emails or by contacting us directly.

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details provided below.




Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and analyze site traffic. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us remember your preferences, track usage, and provide personalized content.
You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.




Our website may contain links to third-party websites. Please note that we are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those websites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any external sites you visit.




We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or as required by law. Once your information is no longer needed, we will securely dispose of it.




We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the updated policy will take effect immediately. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your data.




If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights regarding your personal data, please contact us at:
SARA Institute of Data Science
Email: sara.institute.info@gmail.com
Phone: 925 315 2024

By using our website or enrolling in our courses, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting the SARA Institute of Data Science with your information.




This page was last updated on 2024-11-22 18:06:04.821567
